definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable id="baseIntensity" type="Number">baseIntensity</variable><variable id="shakeIntensity" type="Number">shakeIntensity</variable><variable id="shakeDuration" type="Number">shakeDuration</variable><variable id="isShaking" type="Boolean">isShaking</variable></variables><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_entity_compare"><field name="entity">EntityLiving</field><value name="compareTo"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_set_rotation"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="yaw"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="move_entity"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="spawn_entity_with_rotation"><field name="entity">CUSTOM:Adjucha</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="yaw"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
